import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import './index.css' const Job = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [allcustomer, setAllcustomer] = useState(); const custHandler = async () => { const dt = await axios.get(`http://localhost:10101/job`); setAllcustomer(dt?.data); } useEffect(() => { custHandler(); }, []); const addJob = () => { navigate('/newjob'); } return ( <>
